title: The Lean Startup
author: Eric Ries
summary: Ries' guide to building and growing successful startups. 'The Lean Startup' introduces the lean methodology, emphasizing continuous innovation, validated learning, and adapting to market feedback for entrepreneurial success.

title: Zero to One
author: Peter Thiel with Blake Masters
summary: Thiel's insights on innovation and building a successful startup. 'Zero to One' encourages entrepreneurs to think about the unique value they can create and challenges conventional wisdom about competition and progress.

title: The E-Myth Revisited
author: Michael E. Gerber
summary: Gerber's exploration of the myths and challenges faced by small business owners. 'The E-Myth Revisited' provides insights into building scalable and successful businesses by understanding the roles of the entrepreneur, manager, and technician.
